item.title: Alucinarium
item.description: Alucinarium, Al, is an element and the source of all alucinara magic. It can generate thermal energy, kinetic energy, gravitational potential energy, light, and many more unknown phenomena - all with minimal to no input.

item.title: Central-Continent
item.description: The central continent of 2°e is home to Snixia, Morelland, the Empire of the Petrified Child, and the Sarvaran Civilisation.

item.title: Empire of the Petrified Child
item.description: Language The lingua franca of the Empire of the Petrified Child was Stonechild Imperial.

item.title: Infra-essence
item.description: Infra-essence and Ultra-essence Infra-essence and Ultra-essence are the names given to the phenomena of places, objects, and entities existing within the many realms of Alucinara.

item.title: Kempton Moss
item.description: Kempton Moss, born in 65 YA, was notably the founder of the Afortuitites. He worked as a bark harvester as of 50YA but, disheartened by the Morellic Parliament’s use of Glandlings, quit his job for a life of activism after a period of depression and contemplation.

item.title: Music
item.description: Over the course of my creation of Alucinara, I have also made music, such as; Secrets of the Peeking Light Pts.

item.title: Phantasmarrhoea
Proto-Morellic
item.description: Proto-Morellic Proto-Morellic: /s̠äˈbʱä.z̠ɛç̠/ was spoken in 7,000YA, by the Cervina-Rohitan peoples. Phonology Syllable Structure (C)(S)V(V)(C) Features Penultimate Stress Consonants Consonants Labial Alveolar Post Alveolar Palatal Velar Nasal m n ŋ Plosive p b t d c̠ ɟ̠ k g Plosive (breathy) bʱ dʱ ɟ̠ʱ gʱ Fricative f v s̠ z̠ ʃ ʒ ç x ɣ Sonorant w l r j Vowels Vowel Front Central Back High i u Mid ɛ ɔ Low ä Typology Verb-Subject-Object Nominative / Accusative Singular / Plural Volitional / Nonvolitional Non Past / Past / Distant Past Octal counting system Descendants Proto-Morellic /s̠äˈbʱä.

item.title: Proto-Snixian
item.description: Proto-Snixian Proto-Snixian: /t͡ʃé:sòn épā:ɫìç/ was spoken 8,500 years before the present, by the Proto-Snixian peoples. Phonology Syllable Structure (C)V(C) Features Penultimate Stress

item.title: Realms
item.description: What the scientists of our time fail to understand is that we reside in a tide pool. The tide hasn’t returned to us in millenia, but we still see the ripples created by those whom travel across the pools.

item.title: Sarvara
item.description: The Sarvaran Civilisation existed around 7,000YA, and spoke Sarvaran. Notable People Hastini the Elephant Hastini the Elephant Sarvaran: Hestį́da /xesˈtĩ́.da/was a Sarvaran general who was known to wear a copper elephant mask over his mouth.

item.title: Thirrists
item.description: Thirrists are small tri-segmented citrus fruits of the realm of 2°e. Growth Thirrist Plants start out as 1 of 3 seeds contained in the centre of a Thirrist fruit and, once in the ground, begin to germinate - eventually becoming short, wide trees.
